songs.title: Love Is a Bitch
songs.lyrics:
I say yeah
Love is a bitch
And it will come around
Everywhere so be sure
That I will hunt you down

I say yeah
Love is a bitch
And it will come around
Everywhere so be sure
That I will hunt you down

I say ¡hey!
No somos lo que creen
¡Hey! No somos lo que ven
Somos criaturas celestiales
Cantamos rooooock
Con instintos terrenales
Cantamos rooooock

I say yeah
Love is a bitch
And it will come around
Everywhere so be sure
That I will hunt you down

I say ¡hey!
No nos vamos a vender
¡Hey! No lo pueden entender
Somos criaturas celestiales
Cantamos rooooock
Con instintos infernales
Cantamos rooooock

I say yeah
Love is a bitch
And it will come around
Everywhere so be sure
That I will hunt you down

I say yeah
Love is a bitch
And it will come around
Everywhere so be sure
That I will hunt you down

I say yeah
Love is a bitch
And it will come around

I say yeah
Love is a bitch
And it will come around
Everywhere so be sure
That I will hunt you down

I say
Love is a bitch
Love is a bitch yeah
Come around
I say
Love is a bitch
Love is a bitch yeah

I say yeah
Love is a bitch
And it will come around
Everywhere so be sure
That I will hunt you down
